name: youtubesearch
action: Searches YouTube and returns back a queue.

name: play
action: Plays a track from a url or query.

name: summon
action: Summon the bot to the voice channel you are currently in.

name: splayrand
action: Searches and plays random track from a YouTube search query.

name: poll
action: Ask a 2 option poll.

name: disabledcommands
action: View all currently disabled commands in the server.

name: translate
action: Translate text to another language.

name: qrcodecreate
action: Create a QR code.

name: listbots
action: Lists all the bots in the current guild.

name: mixeruser
action: Get information about a user on Mixer.

name: numtoword
action: Coverts a number to words.

name: bark
action: Bark, bark, bark.

name: leave
action: Will make the bot leave the current Discord guild.

name: youtubeuser
action: Get information about a user on YouTube.

name: splayremix
action: Searches and plays first remix of a track from a YouTube search query.

name: serverinvite
action: Get a link so you can invite Tidal Bot to your server.

name: pastebin
action: Fetch data from a Pastebin.

name: togglemusic
action: Will toggle a user's ability to use the music commands.

name: addcommand
action: Add a custom command for your server.

name: viewconfig
action: Will show the current configuration file of the server.

name: playnext
action: Make a track play next in the queue by keyword.

name: listcommanders
action: Shows all bot commanders.

name: togglecommand
action: Toggle the ability to use a command.

name: getdemservs
action: List all Guilds the bot is connected to.

name: editcommand
action: Edit a custom command that was previously added.

name: coinflip
action: Flip an imaginary coin.

name: fizzbuzz
action: Fizzbuzz!

name: patreon
action: Support MiningMark48 on Patreon! ...or not.

name: togglenpmessages
action: Toggles Tidal Bot's now playing messages when a track plays.

name: announce
action: Announces a message to the channel.

name: tobinary
action: Convert a number to binary.

name: splay
action: Searches and plays first track from a YouTube search query.

name: pause
action: Pauses the current track.

name: stop
action: Stops currently playing track and clears the queue.

name: repeatonce
action: Repeat currently playing track once. Run again to disable.

name: botstats
action: Returns bot stats.

name: twitchuser
action: Get information about a user on Twitch.

name: diceroll
action: Rolls an imaginary dice.

name: voteskip
action: Vote to skip a track.

name: playspotify
action: Play a track that a user is listening to on Spotify.

name: ping
action: Simple Ping, Pong.

name: roles
action: Get all information about the roles used by Tidal Bot

name: announceall
action: Announce a message to all servers.

name: skip
action: Skip current track.

name: botcommander
action: Will add or remove someone as a bot commander for Tidal Bot

name: remove
action: Remove a track in the queue by keyword.

name: sourcecode
action: Get the link for Pearcel Bot source code.

name: undo
action: Removes a previously added track.

name: botinfo
action: Returns bot information.

name: whois
action: Get info about a user on the server.

name: cmds
action: Returns a list of commands.

name: repeat
action: Repeats a currently playing track. Run again to disable.

name: arblacklist
action: Opt-in to be blacklisted from Tidal Bot's AutoResponse system

name: lyrics
action: Search for lyrics for a song by artist and title.

name: cursedata
action: Fetch Minecraft Curse data for a user.

name: githubuser
action: Get information about a user on Github.

name: resume
action: Resumes currently paused track.

name: geoip
action: Get geographic information about an IP.

name: nowplaying
action: Tells what track is currently playing.

name: kickvoice
action: Kick a user from a voice channel.

name: restart
action: Restarts a currently playing track.

name: restartbot
action: Restarts the bot.

name: clear
action: Clear the queue.

name: trivia
action: Answer a trivia question!

name: say
action: Make the bot say something.

name: emojilist
action: Lists all emojis for the guild.

name: selfinfo
action: Get information about yourself on Discord.

name: emojieval
action: Evaluate an emoji.

name: uptime
action: View the bot's uptime.

name: help
action: Get help for a specific command.

name: listcommands
action: List all custom commands for the server.

name: toromannum
action: Turn an integer to a roman numeral.

name: 8ball
action: Roll a Magic 8-Ball™

name: listbannedmusic
action: Shows all users banned for using music on the server.

name: rps
action: Play the classic Rock, Paper, Scissors with Tidal Bot

name: prune
action: Prune an amount of messages.

name: deletecommand
action: Delete a custom command for your server that was previously added.

name: togglear
action: Toggles Tidal Bot's Auto Response.

name: lmgtfy
action: Let me Google that for you.

name: pplay
action: Plays a playlist from a url.

name: shuffle
action: Shuffle the current queue.

name: slap
action: Slap someone.

name: queue
action: Shows current queue.

name: guildinfo
action: Get information about a guild you're in on Discord.
